column3: ɔwo adom w'asaase: Ɔwo edze Jakob egyapadze asan aba."
Na akata hɔn bɔn nyinara do."

column2: "Ɔwo eyi w'ebufuw nyinara kɔ: Na adan woho efi w'ebufuw ne hyeehyew no ho."

column4: Na ma w'ebufuhyew no a ɔwɔ hɛn do no mbɔ adze."

column2: "Aso wo bo bofuw hɛn daa? Aso ebɔtwe w'ebufuw no ekodu mbasantsen nyinara do?"
"A eremma hɛn nkwa bio: Ma wo man nndzi ehurusi wɔ wo mu?"
"Na afei mibetsie dza EWURADZE Nyankopɔn bɛka
column3: Ɔbɛka asomdwee nsɛm akyerɛ ne man
column4: na n'ahotseweefo: Wɔnnkɛdan nkɔ nkwaseasɛm ho bio dze a."

column2: "Ampaara no nkwagye bɛn hɔn a wosuro no no; Ama enyimnyam aatsena hɛn asaase do."
"Mbɔbɔrhu na nokwar behyia; Tsenenee na asomdwee bedzi hɔnho mfewano."
"Nokwar befi asaase mu efir; Na tsenenee efi sor ahwɛ famu."

column3: EWURADZE dze dza oye bɛma; Na hɛn asaase beyi no ndɔbaa."

column2: "Tsenenee bedzi n'enyim; Na ɔdze hɛn esi n'anamɔn kwan do."
